items.sentence: Tom said he had to buy some flowers for Mary.
Tom wants to know what Mary did last weekend.
You\'re giving me more credit than I deserve.
You\'re in no position to tell me what to do.
Tom and Mary traveled together, didn\'t they?
Tom tried to speak to Mary, but he couldn\'t.
That\'s a very beautiful part of the country.
I found it impossible to do the job in a day.
Aren\'t you going to go anywhere this summer?
Ask before you borrow your sister\'s clothes.
Tom muttered something that I couldn\'t hear.
There were many empty beer cans on the floor.
There will be a total solar eclipse tomorrow.
Tom removed the lid from the medicine bottle.
Tom resigned three days after Mary was fired.
Tom risked his life to save the drowning boy.
I\'m really glad that I was able to meet Tom.
I couldn\'t have done that without your help.
I don\'t think Tom knows how to speak French.
Who are you planning on going to Boston with?
